snippet: Kevin Youkilis, who will fill in at third base for Alex Rodriguez, is the Yankees’ youngest major signing of the off-season, joining Mariano Rivera (43), Andy Pettitte (40) and Hiroki Kuroda (37).
abstract: New York Yankees announce that former Boston Red Sox infielder Kevin Youkilis will fill in at third base for Alex Rodriguez for at least half the 2013 season, depending on Rodriguez’s recovery from hip surgery; 33-year-old Youkilis is the Yankees youngest major signing of the off-season, joining veteran pitchers Mariano Rivera, Andy Pettitte and Hiroki Kuroda.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, who will fill in at third base for Alex Rodriguez, is the Yankees’ youngest major signing of the off-season, joining Mariano Rivera (43), Andy Pettitte (40) and Hiroki Kuroda (37).

headline.seo: Yankees Introduce Youkilis, Their Third Baseman for Now
headline.main: Youkilis, 33, Adds Youth to Yankees’ Acquisitions
headline.print_headline: Youkilis, 33, Adds Youth To Yankees’ Acquisitions
